question: My mom had pain in her lower abdomen.she had her US done and they found a lobulated mass 2.5"by 1.5"in her endometrium.it was avascular with mild ascites.ovaries were normal looking.she is 70 and had no spotting or bleeding.she is hypertensive since 3 years,NO diabetes,No weight loss and is on steroids for asthma.What could this be?>?
title: Abnormal Ultrasound
